meanings.definition: To decline to accept or comply with something.
meanings.sent2: He always refuses to share his toys.
meanings.sent3: The cat refuses to wear a hat.
meanings.sent4: The old tree refuses to bend in the storm.
meanings.sent5: The stubborn rock refuses to move from its place.

meanings.definition: To indicate unwillingness to do something.
meanings.sent1: The child refuses to go to bed early.
meanings.sent2: She refuses to participate in the game.
meanings.sent3: The dog refuses to fetch the ball.
meanings.sent4: His heart refuses to give up on the dream.
meanings.sent5: The engine refuses to start on cold mornings.

meanings.definition: To reject something as unacceptable or undesirable.
meanings.sent1: He refuses the offer of a second slice of cake.
meanings.sent2: She refuses to watch scary movies.
meanings.sent3: The robot refuses to clean up the mess.
meanings.sent4: The sun refuses to hide behind the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The lock refuses to open without the right key.
